contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Fosses-la-Ville |picture=Fosses JPG01.jpg |picture-legend=Entrance to the city |map=Fosses-la-Ville Namur Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Fosses-la-Ville in the province of Namur |arms= |flag=Flag of Fosses-la-Ville.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-NM}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Namur|Namur]] |nis=92048 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Benoît Spineux |majority=UC |postal-codes=5070 |telephone-area=071 |web=[http://www.fosses-la-ville.be/ www.fosses-la-ville.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=24 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=42 }} '''Fosses-la-Ville''' ({{lang-wa|Fosse-li-Veye}}) is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Namur (province)|Namur]]. On January 1, 2006 Fosses-la-Ville had a total population of 9,311. The total area is 63.24 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 147 inhabitants per km². ==Villages== *[[Aisemont]] *[[Le Roux, Belgium|Le Roux]] *[[Sart-Eustache]] *[[Sart-Saint-Laurent]] *[[Vitrival]] ==Main sights== *Collegiate church of ''Saint-Feuillen'', rebuilt in the 18th century. It has maintained a Romanesque tower from the 10th century. *''Chapelle [[Brigit of Kildare|Sainte-Brigide]]'', a small sanctuary built by Irish monks ==Twin towns== *{{flagicon|FRA}} [[Orbey]], France *{{flagicon|ITA}} [[Robecco sul Naviglio]], Italy ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:Fosses-la-Ville JPG001.jpg|Brigit of Kildare's chapel File:Plake emon nozootes.jpg|[[Walloon language|Walloon]] name on a house at [[Vitrival]] </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.fosses-la-ville.be Official website] {{commonscat}} {{Namur}} [[Category:Municipalities of Namur (province)]] [[Category:Populated places in Belgium]] {{Namur-geo-stub}}
